Title: Preying on the Predators
Description:
The forest has become far more dangerous ever since Shen-zin Su began shaking. The tigers are agitated and have begun attacking the refugees, and on occasion, me as well.

If these injured and weak survivors are to make it to safety here at the hut, we need to help clear the forest for them.
RewardText: These survivors are in your debt, $c.
